For those really interested in finding the truth I reccommend you to this link:
 http://www.examinethetruth.com/Debate_Video.htm

Hi MMK:
 
 Because it would take over an hour and a half (most likely 2 hours) to download at my connection speed, can you give an overview of the five? What were the points brought up by both sides and how did it go?

Man, even on my T1 connection it downloads "slow" under 100kb/s.
 
 And this thing is LOOOONG. Five 45-60min videos. The first one is very drawn out. It's just too longwinded to sit through, honestly.

The bible had significant flaws in it where the Christian(Dr William Campbell) was unable to explain certain scientific errors, whereas the Koran was clearly compatible with modern day science. I suggest you watch it and make your own conclusions its worth the effort.
